data: John Armitage, Lieutenant U. S. N., followed the porter into the rear car of the midnight express for Boston, and after seeing his bag deposited under a lower berth, stood for a minute in frowning indecision.
rear car of the midnight express | lower berth
Prince or Chauffeur? A Story of Newport
